title: Between Elves and a Hard Place
description: Some boundaries should be crossed. Summoned to the Elven Court, human-servant Wynstelle fears her rule-breaking ways have been discovered. Summoned to the Courts, she fears for her life, knowing elves view mortals as expendable. In exchange for her freedom, the prince demands that Wyn break one rule she never dared to consider. Sheltered and naive, she is shocked but intrigued. However, if she accepts his offer it might cost Wyn her life.The Fae Hearted Series is a Reverse Harem Paranormal Romance set in the Elven Kingdom of Elfhame. Characters "find" themselves. Adventures and romance ensue.Medium Burn Reverse Harem Series.Trigger Warning: Sexual content and adult themes.This is a full-length reverse harem paranormal fantasy romance that features one human woman and her three sexy Elven males. It contains violence, explicit love scenes, curses, magic, and fae.
author: Yve Vale
